comment.body:
There was a time I felt this way... like i had no control and had to just deal with what life handed me. I was very close to the bottom. No money, homeless, no family, no friends... I lost everything. I was in a small town so i was picked on by police because of my situation and ended up in and out of jail. Got to the point i didn't want to leave jail... 

I just wanted to be loved. I felt like i had love to give. 

  Things have changed. My life is completely turned around. And it was because i decided to be my own best friend. I started doing things for myself. Giving myself the attention i would a close friend... it didn't take long for me to notice that my attitude change affected how people treated me.

  My Life is far from perfect but it's so much better now. 

i feel the same way about not being smart enough but I'm trying  .... we're both on zeronet and that takes some intelligence.
